Verses: 1 ippodhum Yaakkobe, Unnai Sirushtiththavarum, Isravele Unnai Uruvaakkinavarumaagiya Karththar Sollugiradhaavadhu: Bayappadaadhe; Unnai Meettukkonden; Unnaip Persolli Azhaiththen; Nee Ennudaiyavan.
2 nee Thanneergalaik Kadakkumpodhu Naan Unnodu Iruppen; Nee Aarugalaik Kadakkumpodhu Avaigal Unmel Puraluvadhillai; Nee Akkiniyil Nadakkumpodhu Vegaadhiruppaai; Akkinijuvaalai Unperil Patraadhu.
3 naan Isravelin Parisuththarum, Un Ratchagarumaayirukkira Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar; Unnai Meetkumporulaaga Egipthaiyum, Unakku Eedaaga Eththiyoppiyaavaiyum Sebaavaiyum Koduththen.
4 nee En Paarvaikku Arumaiyaanapadiyinaal, Ganampetraai; Naanum Unnai Snegiththen, Aadhalaal Unakkup Padhilaaga Manushargalaiyum, Un Jeevanukku Eedaaga Janangalaiyum Koduppen.
5 bayappadaadhe, Naan Unnode Irukkiren; Naan Un Sandhadhiyaik Kizhakkilirundhu Varappanni, Unnai Merkilum Irundhu Koottichcherppen.
6 naan Vadakkai Nokki: Kodu Endrum, Therkai Nokki: Vaiththiraadhe Endrum Solli, Dhooraththilirundhu En Kumaararaiyum, Boomiyin Kadaiyaandharaththilirundhu En Kumaaraththigalaiyum,
7 naan En Magimaikkendru Sirushtiththu Uruvaakkip Padaiththu, En Naamantharikkappatta Yaavaraiyum Konduvaa Enben.
8 kangalirundhum Kurudaraayirukkira Janaththaiyum, Kaadhugalirundhum Sevidaraayirukkiravargalaiyum Purappattu Varappannungal.

9 sagala Jaadhigalum Egamaai Serndhukondu, Sagala Janangalum Koodivarattum; Idhai Ariviththu, Mundhi Sambavippavaigalai Namakkuth Therivikkiravan Yaar? Kettu Meyyendru Sollakkoodumpadikku, Avargal Thangal Saatchigalaik Konduvandhu Yadhaarththavaangalaai Vilangattum.

10 naane Avarendru Neengal Unarndhu, Ennai Arindhu Visuvaasikkumpadikku Neengalum Naan Therindhukonda En Dhaasanum Enakku Saatchigalaayirukkireergal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Enakku Mun Erpatta Dhevan Illai, Enakkuppin Iruppadhum Illai.
11 naan, Naane Karththar; Ennaiyallaamal Ratchagar Illai.
12 naane Ariviththu, Ratchiththu, Vilangappanninen; Ungalil Ippadi Seyyaththakka Anniya Dhevan Illai; Naane, Dhevan Enbadharku Neengal Enakku Saatchigal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
13 naal Undagaadhadharku Munnum Naane Irukkiren; En Kaikkuth Thappuvikkaththakkavan Illai; Naan Seygiradhaith Thaduppavan Yaar?

14 naan Ungalukkaaga Arangalellaam Idindhuvizhavum, Kaldheyar Padavugalilirundhu Alaravum Seyyaththakkavargalai Baabilonukku Anuppinenendru, Ungal Meetparum Isravelin Parisuththarumaagiya Karththar Sollugiraar.
15 naane Ungal Parisuththaraagiya Karththarum, Isravelin Sirushtigarum, Ungal Raajaavumaanavar.
16 samuththiraththile Vazhiyaiyum Valiya Thanneergalile Paadhaiyaiyum Undaakki,

17 radhangalaiyum Kudhiraigalaiyum Raanuvangalaiyum Paraakkiramasaaligalaiyum Purappadappanni, Avaigal Ezhundhiraadhapadikku Orumiththu Vizhundhukidakkavum, Oru Thiri Anaigiradhupol Avaigal Anaindhupogavumpannugira Karththar Sollugiradhaavadhu:
18 mundhinavaigalai Ninaikkavendaam; Poorvamaanavaigalai Sindhikkavendaam.
19 idho, Naan Pudhiya Kaariyaththai Seygiren; Ippozhudhe Adhu Thondrum; Neengal Adhai Ariyeergalaa? Naan Vanaandharaththile Vazhiyaiyum Avaandharaveliyile Aarugalaiyum Undaakkuven.

20 naan Therindhukonda En Janaththin Thaagaththukku Vanaandharaththile Thanneergalaiyum Avaandharaveliyile Aarugalaiyum Undaakkuvadhinaal, Kaattumirugangalum, Valusarppangalum, Kottaan Kunjugalum Ennai Ganampannum.
21 indha Janaththai Enakkendru Erpaduththinen; Ivargal En Thudhiyai Sollivaruvaargal.
22 aanaalum Yaakkobe, Nee Ennai Nokkik Kooppidavillai; Isravele, Nee Ennaikkuriththu Mananchaliththupponaai.

23 un Aadugalai Thaganapaligalaaga Nee Enakku Seluththavillai; Un Paligalaale Nee Ennai Ganampannavumillai; Kaanikkaigalai Seluththumpadi Naan Unnai Sangadappaduththaamalum, Thoobankaattumpadi Unnai Varuththappaduththaamalum Irundhen.

24 nee Enakkup Panangalaal Sugandhapattayaik Kollaamalum, Un Paligalin Ninaththinaal Ennaith Thirupthiyaakkaamalum, Un Paavangalinaal Ennai Sangadappaduththi, Un Akkiramangalinaal Ennai Varuththappaduththinaai.
25 naan, Naane Un Meerudhalgalai En Nimiththamaagave Kulaiththuppodugiren; Un Paavangalai Ninaiyaamalum Iruppen.
26 naam Oruvarodoruvar Vazhakkaadumpadi Enakku Ninaippoottu; Nee Needhimaanaaga Vilangumpadi Un Kaariyaththai Sol.
27 un Aadhithagappan Paavancheydhaan; Unakku Munnindru Pesugiravargalum Enakku Virodhamaai Dhrogampanninaargal.
28 aagaiyaal, Naan Parisuththa Sthalaththin Thalaivargalaip Parisuththakkulaichchalaakki, Yaakkobai Saabaththukkum, Isravelai Nindhanaikkum Oppukkoduppen.
